H0.text: In which English cathedral is the tomb of King John. Canterbury Cathedral

H1.text: In which English cathedral is the tomb of King John. York Minster

H2.text: In which English cathedral is the tomb of King John. Lincoln Cathedral

H3.text: In which English cathedral is the tomb of King John. Worcester

A4.text: The Cathedral contains the tomb of King John in its chancel.

A5.text: Before his death in Newark in 1216, John had requested to be buried at Worcester.
